title: Aviation E-fuels: a good idea? – CONCITO Interview
summary: Karsten Capion of CONCITO, a green think tank based in Denmark, chatted to Finlay Asher of Safe Landing about their analysis related to aviation e-fuels.

title: Contrails: Understanding Their Impact and What We Can Do — A Conversation Between a Pilot and ATC
summary: Join us for a free virtual session led by Katie Thompson, a former airline pilot, as we break down the facts behind aviation’s net zero targets.
